element-citation.article-title: Optical line shapes for polymethine dyes and their aggregates: novel theory of quantum transitions and its correlation with experiment
element-citation.comment: [Proc. 17th Int. Conf. on Dynamical Processes in Excited States of Solids (DPC’10), Argonne Nat. Lab., Argonne, Illinois, USA, 20–25 June 2010]
